docs.title: CLIFF
docs.text: Curriculum Learning with Iterative Force-Field refinement (CLIFF) is a Python package that uses active learning to construct machine learning force fields. Its integration with Parsl enables rapid end-to-end development of these force fields, which can be customized by the user's chosen curriculum.

docs.title: Code Documentation
docs.text: This file makes cliff a Python package. It can be empty or contain initialization code for the package.
